page.title: 17DIARY OF A CHURCHILL FAMILY
page.content: We number six in family, my husband, self and four children aged six, four, two and five months. Life is very hectic and I have little time for housework, most of my energies being directed towards the children. I spend much time keeping them amused and try to take them for a walk each day. I have vast piles of washing and find the automatic washing machine invaluable. I have very little in the way of kitchen gadgets, but find a fridge/freezer useful. Meals are simple, the main one being taken in the evening. The family prefer fish and vegetable dishes to meat. Home safety includes fireguards, cooker guard and a fire extinguisher. Pets kept are two mongrel dogs, one cat and five goldfish.
